1.content:
You let out a heavy sigh as you walked down the halls of the empty palace while the sum shined down outside. The reason for this was because you found yourself being quite bored. Mostly because the wolf Amicus who had brought you to Adastra from Earth about two weeks ago was gone doing political things to gain the other wolves votes to become the next Emperor. Though his younger brother Cassius was off doing the same today as well. And the jackal Nefru had gone out to the city for his own reasons. Though that seemed to be the case for the cat Alex as well.

And so this was why you were wondering the halls in a slow like manner, though you were glad that Cato was gone as well otheriwse you'd have to pretend to be very dumb intelligence wise and if you were being honest you dind't like doing that. But thankfully those thoughts were pushed to the side when you passed by a very dusty looking door that looked to be a bit open.

This prompted you to turn your head to trhe right in slight confusion as you thought out loud, "Huh, that's weird. I wonder why this is partly open. Along with that I wonder if it can even open up fully." And so you walked up to the door and placed your hand on the panel. And to your surprise you heard the door slide open which then revealed an empty room with only tables in it after the lights for it came on.

However, after you had walked inside you noticed that something was on the middle table. Which prompted you to walk up to it and upon a closer look you saw a pedant that was light blue in color. But every so often you saw some white shapes flast on it every so often. This made you curious as you took a hold of the pedant and saw that it oculd even be split into four pieces. But then this led to the question what exactly this was? Was some kind of Parent Tech that was hidden away? Or was it just some kind of odd pedant?

So many questions and yet you had a feeling you wouldn't find out the answers to your questions anytime soon. So instead another idea came to your head that being of who you should give this pedant too? Of course the first choice was Amicus since he had been kind to you despite how things started out between you two. Then there was Neferu who may be a bit flirty with you, but you had a feeling he more so did this to get under Amicus's fur. Well either that he just liked to flirt a lot. Then there was Cassius who you honestly didn't know much about, mostly due to him treating you like a pet and actually believing you were dumb. So doing this might expose Amicus's idea of making you play dumb. But wouldn't that be bgood if he treated you differently. Plus it could make up for what happened to his tail after Amicus pushed him onto the floor. And then there was Alex, who you had gotten along with since you had came to Adastra, and even though you hadn't seen lately maybe giving him a gift could show that you have still been thinking of him in a way. And then you could even give all four of them the pedant in a way if you split it into four pieces from those small panels on it. You'd just have find some extra string of some kind.

And so after you had walked out of the room and made sure the door was back to the position it was in you decided to give this odd pedant to......

You figured that the best thing to do was to give the pedant to Amicus since he was the one who brought you here to begin with. And even though you didn't like being here, you knew that he was the only one on the moon who you could trust. So with these thougthts in your head you decided to go back into Amicus's room and wait for him to return.

-------------

About an hour or so later you saw the door to Amicus's room slide open thus revealing the large muscle gutted wolf who let out a heavy sigh. But upon seeing you a smile spread across his face as he greeted you with, "Marco, I'm sorry that my travels to the city took so long."

"Nah, it's okay Amicus. I figured that'd be the case since you and Cassius are trying to become the next emperor after all." You reassured the large wolf, as you got up off of the couch and then gave him a hug.

Upon doing this you heard the anthro let out a chuckle to which he then returned the hug to you. But while you two were hugging you felt oneof his huge furry ahnds reach into your pocket and then pull out the pedant. After doing this you then saw him look down at you while he asked, "Oh, what's this?"

This question prompted you to blush a little bit while you confessed, "Well I found this pedant and I figured I'd give to you as a gift."

"Aww, that's very kind of you Marco. Thank you very much for this gift. I bet this will be my new good luck charm, besides you of course." The black and gray furry wolf replied, as he put the pedant on and it was up against the middle of his two ;arge pecs.

After doing this the two of you then enjoyed dinner and chatted for a bit of what the wolf did out in the city to convince the other wolves to vote for him to become emperor. And before you knew it was dark outside and the two of you went to bed for the night.

You figured that the best course of action was to give the pedant to Neferu.Sure there was the chance that Amicus would get jealous once he found out that you had given the jackal a gift instead of him. But on the other hand you figured this was a smart thing to do since not only could you say that this was a gift between friends. But also maybe try to convince the jackal that you'll help him get Amicus to be onboard with the alliance between the wolves and jackals. So with this idea in your head you decided to go back to Amicus's room and wait for the anthro to return to the palace.

It was about an hour or so later until you heard Com's voice when he told you, "Neferu has returned to the palace Marco."

"Thanks Com." You replied, as you then made your way out of Amicus's bedroom. You then walked into the hallway and after making a few turns here and there you saw the heavily muscled anthro jackal about to walk into a room. But before he placed his palm onto the panel you attempted to get his attention with a wave of one of your arms while you called out, "Neferu, welcome back."

You looked on as one of the black jackal's golden ears twitch before you saw him look over at you and then completely to face. Upon doing so you saw him smile at you in greeting as you walked up to him as he replied, "Ah Marco, good evening to you. And so what do I own this company of ours?"

Hearing this question and seeing give you such a big smile prompted to blush a very small amount as you reached into your pocket and pulled out the pedant. You then presented it to him as you said, "Well I found this pedant and figured I'd give to you as a gift. As a sign of friendship."

After saying this though you saw the black furred and golden marking covered jackal look at you with a raised eyebrow while he replied, "Oh, a gift of friendship you say? Or you sure it doesn't have another meaning behind it?"

"Erm no, it's just a gift of friendship. Plus I was hoping this could help get you and Amicus to get along with each other better." You confessed, as you saw the jackal gently take the pedant from you and then put it over his head to which it then laid against his pecs.

You then saw him smile down at you again as he responded back with, "Well I'm not sure if this will help Amicus and I get along better. But it's nice to know that I have someone on this moon who seems to care about me."

"Wait, wait, I didn't say that." You protested back, while your face turned a darker red.

"Don't worry Marco, I'm only teasing you." Neferu reassured you, to which you then saw him place a hand onto your head and gently rub his fingers through your hair. After doing this though you saw him wink down at you when he added, "But if you change your mind about us being friends you know where to find me."

After this was said you saw him walk away from you and into the room he had opened up earlier. Once this happened you let out a heavy sigh and then returned to Amicus's room where you ate dinner and then went to bed since you didn't feel like waiting for Amicus and have him get super jealous after telling him what you did.

124.content:
You squinted a little as your eyes struggled to focus on the brightly backlit Neferu against the noon Vita. The jackal’s already muscular silhouette accentuated by the light seemed even more imposing than before. But you quickly dismissed it as a trick of the light.

“Fancy seeing you here Neferu! Nice day for a stroll amongst the shrubbery ain’t it?” You called out to him from over the hedge.

“Ah, if it isn’t my favourite simian consort, out for a jaunt with his significant other I see.” Neferu chirped in his usual confident tone as he sashayed over.

“Don’t you have somewhere else to be?” Amicus said cutting in while rolling his eyes.

“Well now, someone’s clearly woken up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.” Neferu retorted while grandiosely gesturing to Amicus.

“At least I get to wake up next to Marco’s side of the –“ Amicus was cut off by you.

“Oof! What’s up with this awesome climate, on a moon no less! The weather is great wouldn’t you agree?” You interjected with an awkward laugh, as soon as the conversation was about to get tenser.

You knew Amicus was going to be very upset with you doing this. But you knew that it was the right thing to do as you put the pedant in one of the few robe pockets that it had before you said out loud to ourself, "Alright when Cassius gets back I'll give him this pedant as an apology gift and come clean to him. I know this might come back to bite me in the butt. But at this point I don't really care anymore."

And so you decided to return to Amicu's's room and wait for Cassius to return.

-------------

It was about two hours later until Com had told you that Cassius had returned to the palace and was currently in the garden. And so after hearing this you asked, "How will it be until Amcius returns to the palace?"

"Amicus will return to the palace in one hour Marco." Com replied back, to which you then stood up and walked out the bedroom you were in.

Thus you walked out into the hallway and then out into the garden as you saw Cassius sitting on a bench and letting out a heavy sigh clearly exhausted from going around giving various speeches. Seeing this from the white wolf prompted to frown a little as you weren't expecting to see from him. Though with his bone illness maybe even doing that type of was still straining on him. Though most likely you figured it was more a mental strain then a physical one since he didn't appear to be in any pain. Though as you made your way over to him you put your hand into the picket the pedant was in as you took in a sigh of air and then released it before you let out, "Well here goes nothing."

You then saw one of Cassius's ears twitch before you saw him look over at you before he remarked, "Oh, it's you, human."

"My name is Marco." You corrected the thin wolf.

"Yes, yes." The anthro wolf replied, while waving his hand dismissively. You then saw him sit upright before he added, "So why did you come out here? And how exactly did you know I was out here?"

"I asked Com." You simply responded back with, while you let out your own sigh. And I have to apologize for what happened to you after we first met?"

"Tch, so my brother is having his brother apologize for something he did?" Cassius spat back, with a frown on his face.

"Nope, he doesn't even know that I'm out here since he hasn't come back yet from his giving his own speeches to various speeches around the palace." You explained, as you saw the white wolf give you a surprised look with one of his eyebrows raised. Seeing this only made you sigh even more when you continued with, "And I know this is very odd for you to hear me speak so well compared to the other times we've interacted with each other. But that wasn't my idea. It was Amicus's."

"Of course it would be." The thin anthro muttered out, to which you then saw him stand up in front of you. After doing this he then went on, "So was all that you wanted to tell me? Becuse if so then I will take my leave now. But thank you for being honest with me."

Hearing this made you panic a little as you blurted, "Wait a minute, please!" Right upon letting these words slip from your mouth you saw the wolf give you a curious look again before t I wanted to give you a gift too. Just so there wouldn't be any problem between us anymore."

And so you pulled out the pedant from your robe pocket and presented it to the younger brother of Amicus. After doing this you saw the wolf's eyes widen in both shock and surprise as he most likely wasn't expecting you to give him a gift or apologize to you. And so with baited breathe you watched as the white wolf slowly reached out and then took the pedant from you and then proceeded to put it over his head to where the pedant itself was laying up against his flatish pecs as you saw him smile at you in earnest before he told you, "Well this is certainly unexpected. But I will gladly accept this gift from you Marco. However, I still feel like I don't know much about you. So with that said I officially will make you my pet tomorrow morning once both Amicus and Alex return to the palace."

"Erm wait, can you even do that?" You asked, not expecting this from the white wolf.

"Yes, it won't be that difficult depending on whether or not both my brother and Alex agree to this. Plus then this way I can learn more about you. Like where you are from for example." Cassius explained, still with that smile on his face. Hearing this prompted you to become nervous as you saw this coming, but you still weren't expecting it. Howeve,r to your surprise you saw and felt Cassius place one of his hands onto one of your shoulders as he added, "I can tell from your reaction that you don't feel comfortable telling me where you're from. But I assure you that I won't force you to do nor will I tell anyone else about this. The location of your home planet will be kept between only you and I."

"Alright, I guess it couldn't hurt to give this a try." You replied back, as you thought you saw Cassius's tail sway from side to side.

Excellent! Now we just have to wait to make this "trade" of pets official." Cassius said, still with a confident smile on his face.

And so you both went your separate ways for the rest of the night. Though in the back ofyour mmind you wonder how this trade between Amicus and Cassius would go down. However, you knew not to bring this up to Amicus, otherwise he'd most likely march to his brother's room and accidentally really hurt him out of angry. So once the dinner tray was brought to Amcius's room you pshed it in and ate some dinner. After doing this you then decided to go to bed for the night.

------------

You found yourself wincing when you saw Amicus's eyebrows narrow in pure anger and his fur blistered out and his muscles were bulging outward when he shouted, "YOU WANT TO WHAT?!"

"I said that I wast us to trade pets, Amicus." Cassius calmly replied back, while you found yourself taking a step back. After doing this though you heard the white wolf's voice again when he added on, "Besides it's not like I'm forbidding you from seeing Marco whenever you wish." You then saw him cross his arms in front of his himself before he continued, "But let's just say that I've gained an interest in the human."

"Oh, really? So then what was that ugly comment you made some time ago? And how do you know that Marco is a human? Unless....." The muscle gutted wolf questioned, as he quickly trailed off and looked over at you. You then found your eyes widen in slight fear when Amicus aimed his next sentence at you when he went on with, "Oh, I get it now. You decided to stab me in the back did you?"

"Wow, no Amicus, I just got sick and tired of pretnding to be dumb. And plus I wanted to apologize to Cassius for what happened to him after you pushed him onto the floor." You explained, while you saw Alex have a very worried look on his face.

The cat then swallowed a lump in his throat before he muttered out, "I'll go and wait for you in your room Amicus."

After saying this you heard the large wolf let out a grunt and within seconds Alex ran out of the garden and into the palace. Once this occurred you felt one of Cassius's furry hands genlty take a hold of yours as he told you, "Well I think we'd best take our leave and let Amicus cool down Marco."

Sadly while you were passing by Amicus you soon felt one of the black furry hands of the wolf forcibly take a hold o fyou and then add a lot of pressure to it before he muttered out, "So this how you thank me for bringing you to my home and trying to keep you safe? Well I'll make you regret this decision Marco."

You then felt the pressure start to build up as you thought you felt some of his claws dig into your skin which caused you to let out a yell of pain. Upon doing htis though you felt Cassius let go of your hand and then take a hold of Amicus's hand that was on your shoulder while he yelled, "Let him go, Amicus! You are clearly hurting the human!"

This prompted you to look up at the muscle gutted wolf hoping that maybe if he saw how hurt you were he'd let go of you. Instead however, you saw nothing but hurt and rage in his own eyes which only caused you to shiver in actual fear as you weren't sure what you did was the smartest idea anymore. However, while Cassius continued to pull on Amicus's hand he yelled out again, "Amicus, I told you to let go of him!"

A this moment you found yourself closing your eyes as a bright light flashed from the pedant that was around Cassius's neck. Along with this you heard both Cassius and Amicus let out their own yelps of surprise. Though for the white wolf he let out various yelps here and there, obviously in pain of some kind since you could heard his bones creaking for some reason. But after you opened your eyes you saw Cassius looking down at you with concern over your injury and Amicus looked completely taken aback by what he saw.

And once your eyes had adjusted you saw that Cassius had changed because not only did he seem taller, but he seemed more muscular as well. In fact his tail seemed to be healed as well as it swayed from left to right clearly showing that perhaps his bone illness was gone considering how he looked now. In fact once he had turned away from you and stood in front of you, you quickly realized that not only had Cassius grown in both hieght and muscle, but he actually looked to be.....

I won't lie, it is quite....cute."

Once he had done this he then set you gently down onto his bed and told Com to have a doctor come to his room along with another bot to make him some new clothing for his new size. You're welcome Alex." You responded back with, as you returned the smile.

Once you had followed behind Amicus into the dinner room you were quite surprised to only see Cassius and Cato sitting on their beds like they always did during breakfast. However, there was an obvious missing person that being Alex who was sitting down next to the white wolf's bed like his usual was. This prompted you to look at the spot quite confused as you thought to yourself, "Huh, I wonder Alex is? I figured he'd be here like he is always to serve breakfast like I'm going to have to....again."

Though as if knowing what you were thinking you heard Amicu's s voice when he asked his brother, "So Cassius, where is Alex?"

Upon hearing this question you saw one of the white wolf's ears twitch as he waved a furry hand dismissively when he answered back, "Apparently he wasn't feeling well this morning. Though if you ask me he didn't sound that sick, but I suppose illnesses affect all of us differently."

"Yes I suppose that is true." The black and grey furred wolf replied, before he sat down on his bed as well.

After he did this you found yourself letting out a heavy sigh as you knew you'd have to serve both Amicus and Cassius this morning. And so you decided to get to work on putting food on their plates and filling their goblets with wine when they wanted a refill. Thankfully though when Amcius saw that you trying to rush through this you told you to sit down and that he'd take care of his own food. This made it a little easier since then all you had to do was serve Cassius here and there. But once all three wolves had left you let out a heavy sigh of relief as you sat on Amicus's bed alone while you had gotten your plates set with food along with Alex's in case he happened to show up for breakfast.

And as if on cue you heard Com's voice when he asked, "Marco, Alex is outside the door, but would like to know if anyone else is in there with you?"

"Erm no com, tell him that I'm alone." You replied, now feeling confsued by the question.

After giving your reply Com then went silent on your end obviously telling Alex your answer. Then within a few seconds you heard one of the doors being opened and then quickly closed. Once this occurred you found yourself turning around and upon doing so you found yourself becoming confused when you saw a figured covered up by a heavy blanket.

Seeing this prompted you to get off of the bed and walk towards the anthro cat as you asked, "Alex, are you sure you should be right now? Aren't you sick?"

"No, I'm not sick Marco. I'm afraid that I had to lie to Cassius just so he didn't get suspicious." The covered cat explained, as you noticed that he seemed to be looking down at you from inside his blanket made cloak.

"Erm okay. Well I'm glad you aren't sick But if you aren't sick then what's wrong?" You wondered, while the two of you walked over to Amicus's bed and sat down.

But once you had sat down you figured that the dark and light green furred cat would go sit down on Cassius's bed. Instead however you heard the bed groan in slight protest as he got onto it and sat down next to you. You then saw him look at you when he asked, "Marco, if I show you something can you promise to keep this between us?"

"Of course I will Alex. Besides that friends do on my planet." You reassured the cat, while you attempted a reassuring smile to boot.

To your surprise you heard the cat let out a light chuckle before he replied, "How interesting. But I'm glad to hear it because erm well you see..... After you gave me that pedant last night I've gone through some changes....so to say."

"Erm what do you mean by that?" You asked, while you tilted your head to right a bit.

After these words had left your lips you saw Alex get off of hte bed and then start to remove the blanket that was covering him. And once it had fallen down onto the marble floor completely you found yourself staring at the anthro cat with wide eyes and letting out a gasp of shock as Aelx seemed to be.....
142.title: Short One Person

choices: normal. (for the time being)
a few inches bigger then usual.
a few feet bigger then usual.

15.content:
While looking at the pedant in your hand you figured that the only fair thing to do was to split the pdenat into four smaller pedants. That way no one would feel left out and this way maybe no one would think you were paying certain attention to anyone in particular. And so you walked back to Amicus's room and got to work as you were able to find some extra string and you carefully pressed against the small panels that were sticking out on the pedant which then turn the large crystal into four smaller crystals. In fact you were so focused on your work that you hadn't heard Com tell you that everyone was returning to the palace.

Along with this you hadn't even noticed Amicus's bedroom slide oepn and the large wolf walking up behind you and then wrapping you up in his large arms as he greeted you with, "I'm finally back, Marco."

"Oh, hi Amicus. I hadn't realized that you had gotten back. I guess I got too focused on what was I doing to notice." You confessed, as you let out a light laugh more so aimed at yourself then anything else.

"I could see that. So what are you doing with those small pedants?" The black and gray furred wolf asked, as he looked down at them from behind your right shoulder.

"Well I found this large pedant in an empty room and I decided to split the pedant into four smaller ones and give one to you, Neferu, Alex, and even Cassius." You explained, to which you felt Amicus let you go and let out a light scoff.

After doing this he then protested, "I can understanding giving one to me of course. And even giving one to Alex. But why Neferu, or even my brother?"

"Because this could help make an alliance between the wolves and jackals come about more easily. And for Cassius, I figured it'd be a good way for you two make up in a way, you know?" You explained, before you took all four pedants and handed them to the muscle gutted wolf.

Once you do this you saw him give you a confused expression for a few seconds before a large smile spread on his face and he commented, "Oh! That's actually a very smart idea Marco. I'll go give these to them now. But I'll make sure to say that you made these for them. Which might be a bit hard to sell for Cassius since he thinks you're dumber then what you actually. But I'm sure I'll think of something."

You then watched as the black and grey furred anthro wolf walked out of his room after putting his pedant around his neck. Seeing this though only brought a smile to you face as you hoped this could make things a bit more relaxed and not so tensed between everyone. I mean sure Amicus and Cassius were competing to become the next Emperor, but that didn't mean that they needed to hate each other because of that. And so feeling like you accomplished something you went over to the couch and decided to rest for a bit until Amicus pushed the dinner cart into the room.

--------------

The next day however, you noticed that not only wee all fouir male anthros wearing the pedants that you had made them, which they thanked you for. But you also noticed that they seemed to be......
15.title: From One Pedant To Four Pedants

info.brief_description: Marco (aka you) find an odd pendant which may lead to some BIG changes on Adastra.
info.description:
Hello again everyone and so here I am again with a second Adastra based interactive story. This time though as the title says it will be focusing on growth. Though there are some rules we must go over before Marco (aka you) has to deal with a growing anthro.

1. Please keep the point of view in second person.

2. There are different sets heights that you can make the characters grow up to. 10 feet is the smallest and 500 feet is the biggest. However, if you have the characters grow past up to or past 20 feet then they must leave the capital and go to one of the islands since well I feel it's the logical thing to do in that situation. Also the growth is both height and muscle based, though that might be stating the obvious, lol.

3. Speaking of growth please make sure that the growth is at a slow or medium pace sine I'd like to drawn out each of the storylines that can be picked from.

4. Only M/M interactions of course.

5. No death or destruction. Though if say a chair or clothes rip because of the growth then that's okay, but make sure that don't go around destroying buildings and what not since that'd be way out of character....for most of them anyway.

6. Please keep everyone in character at all times.

7. Please try to use good grammar when typing out chapters. If there are a few spelling errors then I will try to find and fix them.

8. Have fun and enjoy.

Oh, also just as a reminder to you guys, Cassius's bone illness is always cured thanks to the pedant on any of this story paths and the four pedant story paths too. But of course by all means feel free to let that be known in each of those story paths in different ways. Be as creative as you want when it comes to that.
